channel.title: Home on StemLinks
channel.description: Recent content in Home on StemLinks

item.title: About
item.description: This website is very much a WIP. I want to make a website that contains resources that I found useful that made my life easier. Rules for Submitting Links Eventually there will be infrastructure that will allow you to add links yourself. All links/resources must follow the following rules: The resource must be helpful to the student. Any scam links, spam links, phishing/virus attempts and/or links that are otherwise harmful and/or irrelevant to the safety or learning of the student is not permitted.

item.title: COMP 1805
item.description: Link: DiscreteMath Unit(s): All Description: “Built by Carleton students, for Carleton students. DiscreteMath.ca is an interactive platform built specifically for content from Carleton’s discrete mathematics courses.” [DiscreteMath.ca]

item.title: COMP 2804
item.description: Link: DiscreteMath Unit(s): All Description: “Built by Carleton students, for Carleton students. DiscreteMath.ca is an interactive platform built specifically for content from Carleton’s discrete mathematics courses.” [DiscreteMath.ca] Link: Pat Morin COMP 2804 Unit(s): All Description: Assignments, previous exams, and video lectures.

item.title: ECOR 1045
item.description: Link: Jeff Hanson Statics Course Unit(s): All Description: A playlist that follows the Statics and Dynamics textbook by Hibbler

item.title: ELEC 2501
item.description: Link: J. Rogers ELEC 2501 Resources Unit(s): All Description: A website consisting of two midterms, a final, PA session textbook problems, notes, and video lectures

item.title: MATH 1004
item.description: Link: Derivative Calculator Unit(s): Derivatives Description: A simple-to-use calculator for derivatives with steps. Link: Integral Calculator Unit(s): Integrals Description: A simple-to-use calculator for integrals with steps.

item.title: MATH 2004
item.description: Link: Mingarelli MATH 2004 Unit(s): All Description: A website that contains the solutions manual for The ABC’s of Calculus 2 textbook by Mingarelli as well as suggested homework problems.

item.title: PHYS 1004
item.description: Link: PHYS 1004 - Relearning Everything Unit(s): All Description: A curated YouTube playlist consisting of video lectures explaining concepts

item.title: SYSC 2510
item.description: Link: Rich Radke Engineering Probability Unit(s): All Description: Lecture videos that follow the Proability and Statistics textbook by Leon-Garcia Link: Jochumzen Probability theory and statistics Unit(s): First topics, Random Variables Description: A YouTube playlist that explains concepts relating to random variables, pdfs, cdfs, and more.

item.title: SYSC 3600
item.description: Link: Swarthmore Linear Physical Systems Analysis Unit(s): Almost All Description: A website with interactive elements that explains most of the concepts taught in class, with graphs and examples. Contains a map of all the topics and how they are connected with each other. Great for learning Bode plots.

item.title: SYSC 4001
item.description: Link: Tutorialspoint Operating Systems Course Unit(s): All Description: Youtube Playlist that follows Operating Systems Concepts textbook by Silberschatz. Link: Michigan Tech CS4411 Unit(s): All Description: Contains practice homework and exams, follows Operating Systems textbook by Anderson.
